branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY3*, Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY3* have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a lowest profile in mechanical jointed rodless cylinders.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type
Rodless Cylinder, MY3*, Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY3*, Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The MY3* Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. It is available with rubber bumpers, air cushions or external shock absorbers as well as a stroke adjuster unit.</p>

branchItem.name: MYAJ, Floating Bracket for MY3 Series
branchItem.description: <p>The MYAJ* mounts directly to the MY3* rodless cylinder carriage to faciltiate integrating with other guide systems.</p>
